PubPub | Product Designer | Boston, MA | Full-time (part-time possible) | On Site

We're based within the MIT Media Lab, working on revolutionizing academic publishing. PubPub is a free and open tool for collaborative editing, instant publishing, continuous review, and grassroots journals. You can read more about the mission of PubPub at: https://www.pubpub.org/pub/hello

We're looking for a versatile product designer that can think critically about users needs, design solutions and work at any point from wireframes to actual CSS. Any coding experience is a plus.

PubPub is built in a modern web stack using ES6, React, Redux and Node.

The position is based in Cambridge MA, we work out of the Media Lab and offer competitive salaries.

Please send us a short introduction and demonstration of your work (behance profile, dribbble profile, PDFs, etc) to pubpub-careers@media.mit.edu!
